name: Dread Loop
description:
Made with Leadwerks Engine
Requires: Microsoft Windows Redistributable 2015 and OpenAL for audio support

Fight rounds of enemy waves and choose an upgrade after every round. This is my first Leadwerks project and a submission to the Leadwerks Halloween game competition.

Controls:
Move: WSAD
Jump: Space
Quick Rotate 180: Right Mouse
Sprint: Shift
